item.title: Task 1 - Favorite Fruit
item.description: By K Venkatesh, Gavin D’Souza and Karan K Geo This contract was written to show demonstrate a proof of concept of a consensus reaching system. The smart contract is written in the Solidity language, compiled using the online Remix compiler. Below is the code for the smart contract. pragma solidity ^0.4.17; contract Ballot { struct Voter { uint weight; bool voted; uint8 vote; } //modifer modifier onlyOwner () { require(msg.sender == chairperson); _; } address public chairperson; mapping(address => Voter) public voters; uint[4] public proposals; // Create a new ballot with 4 different proposals.
